name: One man's trash is another man's treasure.
name_original: One man's trash is another man's treasure.
description:
Disclaimer: This game is a story of fiction. Although it demonstrate a specific situation that a young person seeks help to a trustworthy person, it isn't meant to be used as consulting of any kind and it isn't any kind of aid.  If you got issues with your psychology or if you struggle in your life or if you are in distress, seek help from an expert or a relative you trust. This is just a game.

For the rest 99.9% of the population that does not need such a disclaimer, please enjoy.
